== Moolathara (627665) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Moolathara is a village in the [[Chittur]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 2683 hectares and harbouring 2604 households with total population of 9764 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chittur-thathamangalam]] is at a distance of 21 km. Male population is 4832 and female population is 4932. Scheduled Caste Population is 1011 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1867. Census Location Code of the village is 627665<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 6401 (65.56%)
* Literate male population: 3431 (71.01%)
* Literate female population: 2970 (60.22%)
